com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj

Class ComponentAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.assertj.ComponentAssert

  • public final class ComponentAssert
extends <any>
    Assertion methods for Components.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke assertThat(ComponentContext, Component) or assertThat(Component.Builder).

    Alternatively, use LegacyLithoAssertions which provides entry points to all Litho AssertJ helpers.

        @Deprecated
public ComponentAssert containsOnlySubComponents(SubComponent... subComponents)
        Deprecated. Use extractingSubComponents(com.facebook.litho.ComponentContext) instead.

      • extracting

        public <A> <any> extracting(<any> extractor)
        Extract values from the underlying component based on the Extractor provided.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the value extracted.
        Parameters:
        extractor - The extractor applied to the Component.
        Returns:
        ListAssert for the extracted values.

      • extractingSubComponents

      • extractingSubComponentAt

        public ComponentAssert extractingSubComponentAt(int index)

      • wontRender

        public ComponentAssert wontRender()
        Assert that a given Component renders to null, i.e. its onCreateLayout method resolves to a ComponentContext.NULL_LAYOUT.

      • willRender

        public ComponentAssert willRender()
        Assert that a given Component produces a layout that's not equivalent to ComponentContext.NULL_LAYOUT.
